name: Caustic Retch
description:
On hit, roll 1d4. Apply the corresponding condition to target foe and all adjacent units (including allies) other than this unit:
 - @{condition}{Sickness}{[Sickness]} for one turn.
 - @{condition}{Rattled}{[Rattled]} for one turn.
 - @{condition}{Poisoned}{[Poisoned].}
 - @{condition}{Taunted}{[Taunted]} for on turn.
